detaileddescription.para: The Time Server provides commands to set time. The new time value represents the desired offset from mission-defined time epoch and takes effect immediately upon execution of this command. Time Service will calculate a new STCF value based on the current MET and the desired new time using one of the following:
If Time Service is configured to compute current time as TAI:

para.verbatim: STCF = new time - current MET current time = current MET + STCF

detaileddescription.para: If Time Service is configured to compute current time as UTC:

para.verbatim: STCF = ((new time) - (current MET)) + Leap Seconds current time = ((current MET) + STCF) - Leap Seconds

detaileddescription.para: CFE_TIME_SET_TIME_CC Next: Adjusting Time Up To: Server
